definition: A medical condition that primarily affects the cardiovascular system, causing various abnormalities and impairments. It is commonly used to describe a range of heart-related diseases, including congenital defects, coronary artery disease, and heart failure.

examples.german: Herzkrankheit ist eine Erkrankung des Herzens.
examples.english: Heart disease is a condition of the heart.

examples.german: Die häufigste Herzkrankheit ist die koronare Herzkrankheit.
examples.english: The most common heart disease is coronary heart disease.
Heart diseases can lead to heart attacks.

examples.german: Die Symptome einer Herzkrankheit können Brustschmerzen und Atemnot sein.
examples.english: The symptoms of heart disease can be chest pain and shortness of breath.

examples.german: Eine gesunde Lebensweise kann das Risiko von Herzkrankheiten verringern.
examples.english: A healthy lifestyle can reduce the risk of heart disease.
